channel.title: Sharp blade?
channel.description: So i am modeling a new axe, and i want to make the blade of it sharp if you get what i mean... what would be the easiest way in meta to make the blade come to a point at the bottom, or make it sharp.

item.title: Sharp blade?
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

hard to explain but i’ll make a model quickly like that so you can see what to do.
http://uppit.com/v/WBD47A9W

Just look at how the faces and lines are connected, where i’ve put the points and yer.
It took me less than a minute to make so yer I really don’t care about it. One thing i’ll tell you is that when you do this you should have 3 objects. One containing all the lines, another containing the topside of the model you’re making and the other one containing bottem side. Then you can use the same points for more than one object and not have the objects mix with each other.

Read full topic
